name: Yamamoo
text: I am an employee and also an artist. I have experienced some expressions both with other people and by myself.
自称働く表現家。某物流企業で管理職として激務をこなしながら、いくつかのユニットやソロで日本各地だけでなく、海外でも公演経験あり。

questions.question: Do you think expression is necessary?
Do you often listen carefully?
questions.jp: 耳をそばだてる時ある？

questions.question: Do you want someone to understand?
questions.jp: 理解してほしいと思う？

questions.question: Do you often compare with someone?
Do you want to buy as much as you can at a 100 yen shop?
questions.jp: いやというほど100均で買い物したい？

questions.question: Do you like young people these days?
Did you feel good when you watched the TV program Hanzawa Naoki?
questions.jp: 半沢直樹見て、スッキリした？

questions.question: Do you want to go overseas soon?
questions.jp: 早く海外旅行に行きたい？

questions.question: Do you want to go and see this show?
questions.jp: このイベント見てみたい？
questions.right: 特に行きたいと思わない
